Name: Premium Wireless Headphones Pro
Description: Professional-grade wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium audio drivers. Perfect for audiophiles and professionals.

Name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker Max
Description: Rugged portable speaker with 40-hour battery, waterproof design, and 360-degree sound. Ideal for outdoor adventures and parties.

Name: Business Laptop Pro 15-inch
Description: High-performance business laptop with Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and 15-inch 4K display.

Name: Gaming Desktop Powerhouse
Description: Ultimate gaming desktop with RTX 4080, AMD Ryzen 9, 32GB RAM, and RGB lighting.

Name: Flagship Smartphone 256GB
Description: Latest flagship smartphone with 256GB storage, triple camera system, and 5G connectivity.

Name: Smart Fitness Watch Pro
Description: Advanced fitness smartwatch with GPS, heart rate monitoring, and 14-day battery life.

Name: Gaming Console Next-Gen
Description: Latest generation gaming console with 4K gaming and ray tracing capabilities.

Name: Smart Home Hub Central
Description: Central smart home hub compatible with Alexa, Google, and Apple HomeKit.

Name: Mesh WiFi System 3-Pack
Description: Whole-home mesh WiFi system with seamless roaming and app control.

Name: Portable Power Bank 30000mAh
Description: High-capacity 30,000mAh power bank with fast charging and multiple ports.

Name: Wireless Charging Pad 15W
Description: Fast 15W wireless charging pad with cooling fan and LED indicators.

Name: 4K Action Camera
Description: Ultra HD action camera with image stabilization and waterproof case. Perfect for sports, travel, and adventure photography.

Name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard RGB
Description: Premium mechanical gaming keyboard with RGB backlighting and programmable keys.

Name: VR Headset Immersive
Description: Virtual reality headset with 4K display and spatial tracking technology.

Name: Smart LED Bulbs Color
Description: WiFi-enabled smart LED bulbs with 16 million colors and voice control.
